pageContext.claim: “Check out tweets from last two days. I refer to Fake News Media when mentioning Enemy of the People - but dishonest reporters use only the word 'Media.' The people of our Great Country are angry and disillusioned at receiving so much Fake News. They get it, and fully understand!”
pageContext.analysis: This is preposterous. The president routinely condemns media outlets by name for unflattering coverage. He specifically called the New York Times, NBC, ABC, CBS and CNN "the enemy of the American people" in a previous tweet from 2017.
